Source.Name: reportlab
Source.Summary: Open Source PDF library is suitable for web publishers, developers or creative design professionals who need to quickly and easily create or automate complex (even data-driven) documents
Source.Description: Reportlab is a library for quickly generating PDFs. At the low-level, Reportlab graphics can be used for programmatic drawing including pie-charts, plots, etc. At the high-level Platypus API may be used for automatic layout based on a sequence of logical story elements such as paragraphs, images, and layout hints.
